title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps | Now Streaming on Disney+

author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
Marvel Studios paid homage to the first film adaptation of the Fantastic Four with some special MCU cameos. Learn about the creative process, casting, and VFX behind the unreleased Roger Corman Fantastic Four project and how the actors were brought into The Fantastic Four: First Steps. 

The Fantastic Four: First Steps is now streaming on @disneyplus.

title: Stream Wonder Man January 27 only on Disney+

author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
This week, we travel across the galaxy with Creative Director Frédéric Gémus to learn all about the upcoming retro-inspired beat ‘em up, MARVEL Cosmic Invasion! Plus, we explore the new Marvel Comics event, Age of Revelation, with X-Men writer, Jed MacKay. And Marvel Comics Editor Darren Shan joins us to break down five key alternative timelines from the X-Men’s publishing history. 

00:00 - Welcome Back!
2:08 - Creative Director Frédéric Gémus on MARVEL Cosmic Invasion 
12:36 - Explore Age of Revelation with X-Men writer, Jed MacKay
23:45 - 5 key alternative X-Men timelines with Marvel Comics Editor Darren Shan

title: All About Marvel's Beat 'Em Up Game, MARVEL Cosmic Invasion!  | The Official Marvel Podcast
